Articles.Content: So basically i'm wondering about ranks (you know, the little words that display under your username.) Right now, mine is "Spacecraft Engineer" i'm wondering if it is possible to change what it says. It's probably possible, because I've seen users with ranks that probably aren't built in to the forums (i.e. HypeTrain Driver, Spherical Scientist, etc.) I want to know if it is possible to edit mine, and if so, how to do it.

Settings (top right) > Edit Profile (on the left) > Custom User Title

There's a text input box for choosing your own title and a checkbox to reset it to the default.
Yep. Sad that there's a character limit.
